'''Crystalflies''' are elemental life-forms found throughout Teyvat.

Catching one gives the player {{Item|Crystal Core|x=1}}. Killing them will cause them to vanish instead, giving no drops. Approaching them without certain [[Wildlife Talent]]s will cause them to flee and disappear, but they will reappear if the area is reloaded.
